nodes.text: The Durollia system was a star system located within the Kalamith sector in the Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Durollia.
The Durollia system was explored sometime between 5000 BBY and 3000 BBY during the Great Hyperspace War to the Kanz Disorders. It fell into the area of space known as the Trans-Hydian.
By 25 ABY, the Durollia system boasted a population of several million sentients.
